text: Christopher Michael Barrios Jr. (January 2, 2001 â€“ March 8, 2007) was a 6-year-old American boy who was raped and murdered in Brunswick, Georgia, on March 8, 2007. His body was discovered on March 15, 2007, just a few miles from where he disappeared.
